about_the_game:
Eternal Vault protects your goods through time and space.
They can't be attacked, hacked or stolen.
They don't age and they are constantly updated.
We offer different level of security depending the value of your goods.

The Eternal Vaults are all of this except that you discovered a way to find owners of the Eternal Vaults, and they can be "hacked". Travel in time and be them the time to stole the content of their Eternal Vault and bring it back to your lair! Gather all those precious treasures, the money and find even more rich Eternal Vault owners! That's the plan!

CURRENT VERSION (0.1)
- Very small lair!
- One Eternal Vault owner to replace and rob!
- Seven different obstacles (with many variations each).
- Four levels of difficulty.
- Two different types of collectibles to find to better know the story behind the Eternal Vaults.

PLANNED FEATURES
- Lot of characters & Eternal Vaults to discover and to rob!
- A lot more obstacles and variations to make every heist unique and challenging.
- Deep story linking Eternal Vault company, vault owners and the player.
- Big Lair with lot of customization, galleries and hidden secrets.

name: Eternal Vault

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7-8-10
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Eternal Vault is an action/adventure game where you travel through time and space to rob money and precious unique items from their owners!
